detail.author: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'table > tbody > tr:nth-child(2) > td[align = center] > table:nth-child(1) > tbody > tr:nth-child(5) > td').replace('原創作者：','');}
detail.introduce: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'#info > table > tbody > tr > td');}
detail.upDate: function Main(html){return jsoup(html,'tbody > tr:nth-child(4) > td > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(1) > td:nth-child(2) > b > font');}

chapter.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'fieldset[id=info] > table > tbody > tr > td');}
chapter.name: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'a');}

comic.list: function Main(html){var file=strmiddle(html,'file=','001&');var endid=strmiddle(jsoup(html,'select > option:last-child'),'第','頁');var obj= [];for(var i =1;i<=endid;i++){ var num = i;var n=3;var a = (Array(n).join(0) + num).slice(-n);obj.push('https://web.cartoonmad.com/home75458'+file+a+'.jpg');};return obj;}
